content:
I've adjusted the Friday schedule to move the free time slot earlier in the evening, so you can have more time for family game night. Here's the revised schedule:

**Friday:**

* 7:00 am - Wake up
* 7:15 am - 8:00 am: Personal development activities
* 8:00 am - 9:00 am: Breakfast and getting ready for work
* 9:00 am - 5:00 pm: Work
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Commute home
* 5:30 pm - 6:00 pm: Buffer time
* 6:00 pm - 6:30 pm: Walk with Emily
* 6:30 pm - 7:00 pm: Free time (relaxation or snack)
* 7:00 pm - 8:30 pm: Family time (dinner, etc.)
* 8:30 pm - 10:00 pm: Family game night
* 10:00 pm - 10:30 pm: Wind down and prepare for bed
* 10:30 pm - Sleep

This revised schedule should give you more time for family game night, while still allowing for some relaxation and personal time earlier in the evening. Enjoy your family time!
